video.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
video.synopsis: Fifteen years after the Second Impact, Shinji Ikari joins his father's group NERV as one of several teenage mecha pilots fighting the monstrous Angels.

episodes.synopsis: In the year 2015, an Angel returns to attack Tokyo-3. Misato Katsuragi transports Shinji to the NERV base overseen by his estranged father, Gendo.
episodes.title: Angel Attack

episodes.synopsis: After piloting the Eva Unit 01, Shinji wakes up in the hospital with no memory of the battle. Feeling sorry for him, Misato lets him move in with her.
episodes.title: Unfamiliar Ceilings

episodes.synopsis: Word gets around school that Shinji is the Eva pilot; his classmate Toji resents him for it. An Angel appears and Shinji must pilot in combat again.
episodes.title: The Silent Phone

episodes.synopsis: Stressed out following his last battle, Shinji runs away from home and meets Kensuke. After NERV brings him back in, Misato offers him a choice.
episodes.title: Rain, After Running Away

episodes.synopsis: Unit 00's pilot Rei Ayanami appears to have recovered, but she has no friends, no records of her past, and no interest in getting to know Shinji.
episodes.title: Rei, Beyond the Heart

episodes.synopsis: As the Fifth Angel drills toward NERV, Misato leads Operation Yashima: All of Japan's power will be diverted to take out Ramiel with a positron rifle.
episodes.title: Showdown in Tokyo-3

episodes.synopsis: Ritsuko tells Shinji about the classified true cause of the Second Impact. Then she and Misato attend the field test for an Eva competitor mecha.
episodes.title: The Works of Man

episodes.synopsis: Shinji and his friends accompany Misato to meet Eva Unit 02 and its pilot Asuka at sea. Misato's old friend Ryoji Kaji is aboard with his own agenda.
episodes.title: Asuka Arrives in Japan

episodes.synopsis: Asuka and Shinji face another Angel but it gets the upper hand. They now have six days to learn synchronized moves to destroy it completely.
episodes.title: Mind, Matching, Moment

episodes.synopsis: NERV learns of an Angel in dormant embryonic form inside a volcano. Using equipment designed for magma, Asuka is sent to retrieve it with Unit 02.
episodes.title: The Magma Diver

episodes.synopsis: Tokyo-3 loses power just as another Angel is detected. The Eva pilots must enter the base from the surface while NERV preps the Units manually.
episodes.title: In the Still Darkness

episodes.synopsis: With Gendo and Fuyutsuki in Antarctica, a newly promoted Misato is in charge when a new Angel appears above the Earth, aiming to bomb Tokyo-3.
episodes.title: A Miracle’s Worth

episodes.synopsis: An Angel infiltrates NERV, quickly taking over the MAGI supercomputer. Ritsuko proposes writing a program to forcibly evolve Ireul to its extinction.
episodes.title: Angel Infiltration

episodes.synopsis: As Seele reviews NERV and Gendo's actions with the Third through Eleventh Angels, Ritsuko conducts a test in which the Eva pilots switch Units.
episodes.title: Seele, the Seat of the Soul

episodes.synopsis: For the first time in years, Shinji meets his father at his mother’s grave. Ritsuko, Misato and Ryoji attend a wedding and Asuka goes on a date.
episodes.title: Lies and Silence

episodes.synopsis: While in battle, Shinji and Unit 01 are engulfed in the spreading shadow of an Angel. As NERV fears them both lost, Shinji has a strange experience.
episodes.title: The Sickness unto Death, and Then…

episodes.synopsis: NERV-02 in Nevada vanishes, along with the Eva Unit 04. With Unit 03 on the way, Gendo orders Ritsuko to assign a pilot to it.
episodes.title: The Fourth to be Qualified

episodes.synopsis: Unit 03 arrives from the United States, but Shinji still doesn't know who its pilot is. During testing, NERV learns Unit 03 is possessed by an Angel.
episodes.title: Life and Death Decisions

episodes.synopsis: Distraught after the battle, Shinji vows to never pilot an Eva again and quits NERV once more. Just as he's about to leave, another Angel attacks.
episodes.title: A Man’s Battle

episodes.synopsis: After achieving an unheard of synchronization rate, Shinji merges with Unit 01. While he has an out of body experience, NERV works to salvage him.
episodes.title: Of the Shapes of Hearts and Humans

episodes.synopsis: Seele kidnaps Fuyutsuki and interrogates him about NERV and Gendo's true intentions, revealing events from the past. Ryoji goes missing.
episodes.title: The Birth of Nerv

episodes.synopsis: Asuka's synchronization ratio continues to drop, undermining her self-confidence. Determined to show her worth, she ignores orders during battle.
episodes.title: Staying Human

episodes.synopsis: Despite her struggles, Asuka is ordered to assist Rei in battle against Armisael. When she fails, Rei makes a desperate move in order to save Shinji.
episodes.title: Tears

episodes.synopsis: Kaworu Nagisa, the Fifth Child, comes to NERV to pilot Unit 02 in Asuka's place. He's friendly to Shinji, but he's shrouded in mystery.
episodes.title: The Last Cometh

episodes.synopsis: The Human Instrumentality Project begins, and the souls of humanity merge. The Eva pilots confront the nature of their existence as reality dissolves.
episodes.title: The Ending World

episodes.synopsis: The Human Instrumentality Project continues. Shinji must decide whether to accept a world alone, or embrace connections with others.
episodes.title: The Beast That Shouted 'I' at the Heart of the World
